name: Bug Pizza
description:
B U G   P I Z Z A

It's you vs the big bug. Who's gonna win?

Use WASD and your wits to test your luck, but don't run out of crumbs or it's game over. Evade your opponent and push THE DIE to activate it.  When it comes to a standstill, best not to be too close, for the mighty Powers it holds within are just as much a danger to you as they are to your foe...

Whomever survives the Wrath of THE DIE longest shall claim victory.

 *       *       *

There will be sauce. 

There will be blood. 

But in the end, 

only One will win the right

to Consume. 

*       *       *

Art by Lance Morrison. Programming by Titus Morrison
